articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says Elon Musk-backed letter calling for AI pause wasn't 'optimal way to address it' - Fox News
articles.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said during a MIT event Thursday that he disagrees with a portion of the letter signed by Elon Musk and others calling for a pause on some AI development.
articles.content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says that a letter signed by Twitter CEO Elon Musk and others in the technology community calling for a pause on "giant AI experiments" wasn't the right way to address the issue… [+2370 chars]

articles.author: FiercePharma
articles.title: FDA advisers back Lundbeck and Otsuka's Rexulti in Alzheimer's disease agitation - FiercePharma
